select sc.id, CAST(wu.nickname AS CHAR(100) CHARACTER SET utf8) inviterNickname, sc.mobile inviterMobile, (select CAST(nickname AS CHAR(100) CHARACTER SET utf8) from wx_user where open_id = wr.parent_open_id) inviteeNickname, wr.create_time inviteTime from shop_customer as sc left join wx_relate as wr on sc.open_id = wr.open_id left join wx_user as wu on sc.open_id = wu.open_id where wr.parent_open_id is not null
and mobile = #{mobile}

select so.id, CAST(wu.nickname AS CHAR(100) CHARACTER SET utf8) nickname, sa.name receiver, so.message, so.order_sn, so.real_price, so.status, so.total_price, so.has_pay, so.create_time from shop_order as so left join wx_user as wu on so.open_id = wu.open_id left join shop_address as sa on so.open_id = sa.open_id where 1=1
and so.order_sn = #{orderSn}
